message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $15,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I'm not willing to pay $15,000 for the product. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm aiming for a slightly higher price.  Would you consider $13,500?
I'm still not comfortable with the price, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $12,500. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value I'll get from the product.
